contests.description: Welcome to the Amazon Nova AI Hackathon! Amazon Nova is a portfolio of foundation models and services that deliver frontier intelligence and industry-leading price performance. This is your chance to invent with freedom and build with Novaâ€™s capabilities, including advanced reasoning, tool use, multimodal understanding, voice AI, and UI workflow automation. Nova 2 Lite, a fast, cost-effective reasoning model for everyday tasks. Nova 2 Sonic, a speech-to-speech model for conversational AI. Nova Act is a service to build and manage fleets of agents for automating production UI workflows with high reliability. Nova multimodal embeddings: A state-of-the-art multimodal embedding model. Join and build innovative Gen AI applications using Amazon Nova! Why Participate? Innovate with Next-Gen AI. Explore the frontiers of generative AI and apply Nova's differentiated features to solve real-world problems. Real-World Impact. Develop solutions that deliver measurable value for businesses or create meaningful benefits for communities. Compete for Prizes. With a prize pool of $40,000 in cash and $55,000 in AWS credits, your innovative projects could earn significant rewards. Learn and Grow. Access dedicated resources, code examples, technical documentation, virtual workshops, and office hours to support your journey. Showcase Your Skills. Gain recognition for your expertise and show everyone your hard work. Get Started Amazon Nova 2 developer guide for foundation models and for Nova Act Amazon Nova website More Resources to help you!

contests.title: GitLab AI Hackathon
contests.description: AI writes code. That's expected now. The real opportunity? Everything else. Planning. Security. Compliance. Deployments. These are the bottlenecks that slow teams down every day. And they're wide open for automation. We're opening up the GitLab Duo Agent Platform and inviting developers worldwide to build AI agents that help you and your team to build secure software faster. Not chatbots that answer questions. Agents that jump into workflows, respond to events, and take action on your behalf. Think of it as building a digital teammate for every developer using GitLab. Why Join? Be early: Get access to the GitLab Duo Agent Platform for the duration of the hackathon while itâ€™s fresh! Learn it. Build on it. Shape it. Learn how to build agents that assist you with tedious tasks such as creating tests Learn how to build a flow of agents and orchestrate an entire team of purpose-built agents to build & deploy feature requests from creating, testing, security scanning to deployment. Make an impact: Your agent could ship to thousands of GitLab users. This isn't just a side project that sits in a repo. Win $65,000 in prizes. Compete for the Grand Prize or win one of our category prices Get Started Join Discord and get to know each other in #ai-hackathon. Explore GitLab Duo Agent Platform. Request Access to the GitLab AI Hackathon group. Learn how to create GitLab custom Agents. Learn how to create GitLab Flows. Discover whatâ€™s possible in our GitLab Duo prompt library.

contests.title: Elasticsearch Agent Builder Hackathon
contests.description: About the challenge Welcome to the Elasticsearch Agent Builder Hackathon, running from January 22 to February 27, 2026. Build context-driven, multi-step AI agents that combine search, workflows, tools, and reasoning to automate real-world tasks. This isnâ€™t about single prompt answers, itâ€™s about agents that retrieve the most relevant context, select the right tools, and execute tasks across multiple steps. Your mission is to design agents that actually get work done. Compete for a share of $20,000 in prizes, collaborate with Elastic engineers, and get featured on our blog and social channels. We canâ€™t wait to see the agents you develop Why participate ? Build agents for real work: Design agents that reason, use tools, keep context, and actually finish tasks. Level up fast: Practice multi-step reasoning, tool orchestration, and stateful workflows under real constraints. Win and get seen There is $20,000 on the table, plus exposure on blogs and social channels. What's Elasticsearch and Agent Builder Elasticsearch is an open source, distributed search and analytics engine built for speed, scale, and AI applications. As a retrieval platform, it stores structured, unstructured, and vector data in real time. It delivers fast hybrid and vector search, real-time analytics on logs, metrics or events, and enables AI-driven applications with high performance, accuracy, and relevance. Agent Builder is a framework to rapidly create custom agents that connect LLMs to private Elasticsearch data. Tailor tools to query indexes, trigger workflows, or use piped query language for logic, relevance, and personalization. It supports custom agents accessible via Kibana, APIs, MCP, and A2A.

Whether youâ€™re exploring AI for the first time or scaling advanced machine learning workflows, this is your opportunity to build impactful applications on a developer-first cloud platform designed for speed, simplicity, and scale. Why join? Learn to build and deploy full-stack AI apps with DigitalOcean Gradientâ„¢ AI. Experiment with GPU-powered AI infrastructure and production-ready workflows. Compete for cash prizes and build something you can showcase. Get Started Signup for a DigitalOcean account! About DigitalOcean Gradientâ„¢ AI DigitalOcean Gradientâ„¢ AI is a full-stack AI platform that simplifies the entire machine learning lifecycle. With GPU-backed compute, flexible workflows, and seamless deployment, Gradient AI enables developers to move from idea to production faster all within DigitalOceanâ€™s unified cloud ecosystem. In Partnership with Major League Hacking This hackathon is proudly supported by Major League Hacking (MLH), the global leader in developer hackathons. MLH empowers builders worldwide through inclusive, high-quality events and provides participants with access to resources, tooling, and community to help them succeed.
